subject: Shipping question
description_text:
Hello,

If I would order black plus x 3 pedals as in the photo, from where they
would be shipped out? Because if it not from Europe, I have to pay taxes.



Karolis Bučinskas
+370 605 08661

conversations.body_text: Hi Karolis Bučinskas,    We ship from our German warehouse. If an item is out of stock there, we'll ship it from China instead. Should any customs duties apply, we'll cover them for you—no need to worry.

Hello,

I have ordered your pedals from your amazon.de shop, but still got to pay
import tax. Is it normal?

2025-12-11, kt, 06:06 support@simsonn.com
Hi Karolis Bučinskas,  ​How much is the fee? Please provide your order number, we will refund it to you.

Hello, please find  and payment copy attached.

Karolis Bučinskas
+370 605 08661


On Mon, 29 Dec 2025 at 10:17, support@simsonn.com
Hi Karolis Bučinskas,     We have issued the fee to you through Amazon’s refund system, please check it later.
